original_title: AGFA Mystery Mixtape #4: Follow Your Own Star
overview: Unleashed from the video vaults of the American Genre Film Archive (AGFA), AGFA MYSTERY MIXTAPE #4: FOLLOW YOUR OWN STAR is a brand new compilation of the most electrifying found footage mayhem that youâ€™ll see this week. For this latest tape, our deep dive into behind-the-scenes horror is complemented by an even deeper dive into television from Dimension X.
tagline: Something is watching you . . . something which is not of this Earth.
title: AGFA Mystery Mixtape #4: Follow Your Own Star
